CustomField.description: Departure Date and Time of the Outward Journey Is used to be displayed on email Templates This field is a Text field because a Date/Time field cannot manage the DST time during summer and it creates major issues
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Departure Date and Time of the Outward Journey Is used to be displayed on email Templates This field is a Text field because a Date/Time field cannot manage the DST time during summer and it creates major issues
CustomField.label: Departure Date/Time (Outward)
